1370: Lubertus moved to Muurhuysen2.D.2 after marriage.
Got married to Sarre at age 36 in 1370.
Had a son with Sarre, Elyasа, at age 36.
1371: Had a daughter with Sarre, Menoldis, at age 37.
1372: Had a daughter with Sarre, Lisebette, at age 38.
1373: Had a daughter with Sarre, Esa, at age 39.
1375: Had a daughter with Sarre, Thedwi, at age 41.
1377: Lost his wife Sarre while she was giving birth to Linnea in 1377.
Became caretaker of Elyasа, Menoldis, Lisebette, Esa, Thedwi, Linnea at age 44.
